short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks if the current website is supported by Zapier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
That Automation App - Zapier Integration Checker
Boost your productivity with That Automation App, the ultimate tool for Zapier users and automation enthusiasts!

Key Features:
ðŸš€ Instant Zapier Support Detection: Automatically detect whether the site you're browsing is supported by Zapier, making automation opportunities easy to spot.
ðŸ“Š Comprehensive Integration Details: View available triggers and actions for each supported app directly from the extension, helping you plan workflows instantly.
ðŸ”— Direct Zapier Integration Links: One-click access to specific Zapier integration pages, allowing you to set up automations quickly and efficiently.
ðŸ’¡ Mini Popup Notifications: Get notified when you're on a Zapier-supported website, ensuring you never miss a chance to automate.
ðŸ”„ Real-time Updates: The app stays updated with Zapierâ€™s ever-growing list of integrations, supporting over 100 popular apps and services.
âš¡ Lightning-Fast Performance: Built-in caching reduces API calls, delivering swift results without slowing down your browsing experience.
ðŸ”’ Privacy-Focused: Your privacy is important to usâ€”no personal data is collected or stored.

Whether you're a seasoned Zapier expert or new to automation, That Automation App is the perfect companion to help you unlock time-saving workflows right from your browser. Transform your browsing into an automation hub and take your productivity to the next level!

Note: We are aware of a bug affecting the searching of some website. A fix is coming soon. 

Version 1.3 - Coming Soon:
- More Supported Apps: Expanding to include even more Zapier-compatible platforms.
- Additional Triggers and Actions: Enhancing your automation possibilities.
- PowerAutomate Support: Coming soon on our roadmap.
- Make Support: Coming soon on our roadmap.

CHANGE LOG: 

[1.2.3] - 2024-10-28
Changed
Updated manifest.json to address broad host permissions issue
Modified background.js to use chrome.tabs.sendMessage only when activeTab permission is granted
Updated content.js to add a listener for messages from the background script
Adjusted popup.js to work with the new permissions model

[1.2.0] - 2024-09-23
Added
Implemented mini popup functionality for Zapier-supported pages
Created content.js to handle mini popup display
Added comprehensive list of 101 Zapier-supported apps with their domains, triggers, and actions
Changed
Updated background.js and popup.js to support the new mini popup feature
Enhanced popup interface to show more detailed information about Zapier integrations
Modified manifest.json to include content scripts
Fixed
Improved error handling and edge cases in background.js and popup.js

[1.1.0] - 2024-09-13
Changed
Updated version number to 1.1.0 in manifest.json
Popup interface showing Zapier integration status, triggers, and actions
Enhanced list of supported websites to 50+

[1.0.0] - 2024-09-12
Added
Initial release of That Automation App
Chrome extension that checks if the current website is supported by Zapier
Caching system to reduce API calls
